snippet.title: Who is Abby - Official Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Who is Abby v1.0 will release on the 21st of August. Find out more about and add to your wish list here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2614800/Who_is_Abby/

🔍 The ultimate first-person mystery adventure game, demo now available on Steam! 🔍

Join Tom, brother to an urban exploration writer Abby, He sister went on a camping trip hoping to stumble onto some interesting abandoned locations and hasn't been heard from since. This narrative-driven game combines suspense, exploration, and puzzle-solving to create a truly immersive experience.

In Who is Abby, you'll explore meticulously crafted environments, uncover hidden clues, and piece together the enigmatic story of Abby's disappearance. Experience the first chapter for free with our demo and get a taste of the intricate details and engaging gameplay that awaits you.

🌟 Key Features:
- Immersive Storytelling: A deep, narrative-driven adventure with darkly comic undertones.
- Detailed Environments: Explore beautiful, realistic settings filled with secrets.
- Intuitive Puzzles: Solve puzzles that seamlessly integrate with the story.
- Character-Driven Plot: Get to know Tom and other intriguing characters as you unravel the mystery.
- Free Demo: Play the first chapter for free on Steam!

📅 Full Game Release Date:
Who is Abby will launch on August 21, 2024. Prepare for an unforgettable journey into the heart of the mystery.

💸 Pricing:
- $19.99 USD
- £16.99 GBP
- €18.99 EUR
Don't miss out on the Early Access version available at a reduced price, which includes the first five chapters. Your game will automatically update to the full version upon release at no additional cost.

💾 Wishlist and Follow:
Add Who is Abby to your wishlist and follow our page on Steam to stay updated with the latest news and releases:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2614800/Who_is_Abby/

🎮 Join the Adventure:
Watch the trailer now and step into the mystery!

📱 Follow us on social media for updates and behind-the-scenes content:

https://x.com/cyber_flux
https://www.facebook.com/cyberfluxgames
https://www.tiktok.com/@ratemyfuneral/

Thank you for watching! Your support means the world to us.

#WhoIsAbby #MysteryAdventure #SteamGame #IndieGame #FirstPersonAdventure #NarrativeDriven #PuzzleGame #ExplorationGame #UrbanExploration
